name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Chrome Extension powered by ChatGPT - Magictool AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your All-in-One AI Chrome Extension featuring ChatGPT, AI Writer, Grammar Checker, Paraphraser, Youtube Summarizer +20 more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get access to ChatGPT and GPT4o (paid), ask questions and get instant answers 
Proofread your writing with our Grammar Checker. Select any sentence on the page and get instant grammar check 
Write professionally using our AI Writer and Paraphraser which allows you to choose your writing style
Summarize Youtube videos as well as Web Articles and PDF documents with the help of ChatGPT. Take beautiful Screenshots directly from your browser

üéÅ Try it out now. You will get free credits "every day" to use our AI Chrome Extension. You need to "create an account" to use the extension.

‚≠ê Features

1- Grammar Checker: Select text on any page to check grammar and spelling using ChatGPT
2- ChatGPT Access: you will be able to use ChatGPT every day
3- Chat with PDF documents using AI and PDF.js
4- Youtube Summary: Summarize Youtube Videos (Transcript and Comments)
5- Summarize Articles and Web Pages
6- GPT4o *
7- Generate AI Images
8- Data Scraper (Extract information from any page)
9- Magic Editor: Private AI Text Editor
10- Explain text
11- Youtube Video Dubbing using AI*: watch Youtube videos dubbed in other languages 
12- Improve text: improve your writing including grammar and composition
13- Simplify language
14- Make Shorter
15- Make Longer
16- Paraphraser: paraphrase your writing in different styles 
17- Summarize paragraphs
18- Continue writing
19- Add Emojis
20- Translate text (using Google translate)
21- Take Notes
22- String Manipulation (upper and lower case, length ..etc)
23- Magic Shortcut: invoke ChatGPT from any text field on the page by starting your line with the magic word "magic:"
24- Dark mode toggle: Force Dark Mode for any webpage
25- Add your own custom command/prompt
26- Reader View: Read web pages in a clutter-free format by removing ads, header, sidebars, and pop-ups.
27- Data Analysis (CSV/XLS): Analyze CSV and Excel files easily with the help of ChatGPT
28- Timer
29- Todo Checklist
30- AI Writer: write in different styles and lengths using AI
31- AI Paraphraser: Paraphrase your paragraphs to avoid plagiarism using ChatGPT in different writing styles
32- Screenshot Capture and Beautification

* Pro & Pro+ plans only (GPT-4o Voice and Video NOT supported yet)
** We utilize ChatGPT Technology to provide our AI features

Keyboard Shortcut: Mac: Command+M. Windows/Linux: Ctrl+M 

üôå There is no other extension available that combines all of these features in one package


‚≠ê Free trial

This extension is free trial, you will receive daily credits to try all our AI tools, if you need more credits then please subscribe to any of our payment plans: https://magictool.ai/pricing


‚≠ê Which tools are 100% free?

1- All non-AI tools on magictool.ai
2- Text manipulation features (ex: upper and lower case, etc...)
3- Take Notes
4- Magic Editor (without the AI features)
5- Data scraping for pages
6- Night mode toggle for pages
7- Todo list
8- Timer
9- Screenshot Capture and Beautification


‚≠ê Who is it for?

Content creators: 

In addition to ChatGPT, our AI tools helps you with the following: AI writer and paraphraser while choosing your style, Use a grammar checker to proofread your writing, spelling checker, simplifying language, and generating AI images, which are beneficial for writers, digital marketers and SEO professionals.

Researchers: 

Researchers can greatly benefit from the web article summarisation, grammar checking in academic writing, paraphrasing sentences, also summarizing pdf files using AI, enabling them to write and skim through lengthy documents efficiently with the help of ChatGPT. Finally you can also get a summary of a Youtube video to save time.

Students: 

Our AI tools can assist you in doing your homework, studying, essay writing, checking your grammar,  paraphrasing, chatting with Chat GPT,  summarizing Youtube Videos and PDF documents, note-taking, notepad, todo list and timers

Software Engineers: 

You can ask ChatGPT to write code snippets and explain code on Stackoverflow


Professionals:

Access quick answers by summarizing web pages and lengthy PDF files. Enhance your workplace communication and write emails in a specific tone with the help of AI and ChatGPT. Conveniently check grammar, paraphrase paragraphs in different styles, and enjoy a smart notepad right in your browser, you can also extract data from pages such as google maps. Finally you generate a summary of Youtube videos. You can also take screenshots for any area in the page and even make it more beautiful before download


‚≠ê Privacy: why should I trust you with my privacy?

1- Each version of Magictool AI is strictly reviewed by Google
2- You can decide domains in which the extension will not be activated (via the "Private Domains" setting)
Video: https://youtu.be/NwT_b5YGHxU
3- We collect minimal user information (only name and email)
4- Our code is minimal - less than 1/2 MB - since we only add the code we need 
5- We don't use Google analytics and we don't load any external code in our extension, everything is included in the extension
6- We collect usage data (which features do you use) but we allow you to disable it from the settings, and we share what is sent to our servers with you 
7- When using our AI features we send your input to Open AI servers so we can't guarantee how they use your text, please check their privacy policy if you are interested.
8- Please check our privacy policy for more details

We really care about your privacy and we consider it our own
